description: Denominators of continued fraction convergents to sqrt(321).
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,0,0,430,0,0,0,-1).
mathematica: Denominator[Convergents[Sqrt[321], 30]] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_ Dec 21 2013 *)LinearRecurrence[{0,0,0,430,0,0,0,-1},{1,1,11,12,419,431,4729,5160},30] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Dec 24 2015 *)
prog: (MAGMA) I:=[1,1,11,12,419,431,4729,5160]; [n le 8 select I[n] else 430*Self(n-4)-Self(n-8): n in [1..40]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Dec 21 2013
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
